name: The Blood Mage by Daniel da Silva
name_original: The Blood Mage by Daniel da Silva
description:
The Blood Mage is a turn-based Puzzle/RPG hybrid where you need to find a path to the powerful blood crystal.

You play as a blood mage which means that every spell you cast is draining your life essence; your health doubles as your mana pool.

The path you take and the order in which you encounter the fights is the puzzle you need to solve. You can use everything strategically, items and enemies alike. It is normal that you have to restart more than once. Next time you will get further!

Key Features

  • Deterministic Turn-Based Combat
  • Explore Multiple Possible Paths
  • Fast-Paced Movement and Fights
